sub_title: Senior Researcher | Expert in catalysis, chemistry and materials
summary:
•	Creative and result-oriented R&D expert with 10 years of experience in chemical engineering, analytical techniques, and catalysis for oil & gas, chemical manufacturing, and automotive industries.

•	Efficient communicator and fast learner, experienced in leading and coordinating R&D projects, designing, constructing, and maintaining laboratory equipment up to a small pilot scale, planning and performing tests and analyses, communicating with technical and business stakeholders on different levels.

•	Excellent teamplayer as well as an enthusiastic self-starter, ready to share deep knowledge and practical experience in order to achieve project goals.

Writing a Scientific Article in English

profile_positions.description:
Project: "Development of inorganic semiconductor coatings for photocatalytic degradation of pollutants and pathogens"

•	Developed new photocatalytic coatings for protection against volatile organic compounds (VOCs), optimized their deposition and testing strategies
•	Designed the setup for testing of photocatalytic coatings, developed P&I diagrams and organized commissioning of components for the setup
•	Supervised the development of antiviral and antibacterial coatings, which showed 100% efficacy against SARS-COV-2 and E. coli
•	Supervised graduation projects of two MSc students
profile_positions.title: R&D Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project: "Upgrading of waste tire pyrolysis oil for further commercialization"

•	Organized renovating and starting up of the experimental facilities, including small-scale pilot plant and analytical equipment, maintained them on daily basis 
•	Developed protocols to analyze in detail the composition of pyrolysis oil, which allowed to identify the most relevant approaches for its upgrading
•	Designed experimental plans and executed catalytic hydrotreating tests, achieving >50% removal of impurities from the pyrolysis oil
•	Formulated recommendations for the industrial client regarding the storage and upgrading of the pyrolysis oil
•	Coordinated graduation projects of PDEng and BSc students
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project: "Design of a catalyst for direct conversion of methane to methanol"

•	Developed the first MOF-based catalyst for mild methane oxidation
•	Established the active site structure for a number of heterogeneous catalysts using advanced characterization techniques, which resulted in >10 publications
•	Rationalized the synthesis procedure for different types of porous frameworks, which allowed to minimize their decomposition during synthesis
•	Coordinated multi-disciplinary collaborations in the Netherlands, France, Spain and Russia
•	Designed P&IDs and coordinated construction of the setup for mild methane oxidation, operated and maintained the setup on a daily basis
•	Assisted in teaching "Chemical Reactor Engineering" course for BSc students (12 seminars and 48 supporting hours, 70% of more than 350 students in total successfully passed the exams)
•	Participated in 7 international conferences with oral and poster presentations
profile_positions.title: Research Project Manager

company.name: Boreskov Institute of Catalysis SB RAS

profile_positions.company: Boreskov Institute of Catalysis SB RAS
profile_positions.description:
Project: "Model automotive catalysts with enhanced low-temperature activity"

•	Determined active species in model automotive catalysts, which helped to improve their synthesis protocol, achieving a 9-fold increase in activity at 50°C
•	Developed measurement solutions for XPS characterization of complex, inhomogeneous and unstable samples
•	Participated in 6 international conferences with oral and poster presentations
profile_positions.title: Laboratory Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Project: "Development of molecular magnetic materials"

•	Synthesized new complexes of stable organic radicals with paramagnetic metals
•	Mastered skills of organic synthesis and ion-exchange chromatography
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher
